text: ahō viśvāsa kaḷavuni! num̆balā allāhgē udavkaruvan lesa siṭinu. “allāh veta maṭa udav karannō kavurun dæ?” yi maryamgē put īsā (tama) gōlabālayinṭa pævasuvāk men. “api allāhgē udavkaruvō vemu” yæyi havāriyvarun (gōla śrāvakayō) pævasūha. (pasuva) isrāīl daruvangen pirisak viśvāsa kaḷa atara tavat pirisak pratikṣēpa kaḷōya. eviṭa api viśvāsa kaḷavun va ovungē saturanṭa erehi va api śaktimat kaḷemu
